characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a black car, driver of a truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy road at night. The self-driving vehicle is following a truck closely. A white sedan on the left side is moving forward, and a black car on the right side is stationary. The truck ahead is maintaining a consistent speed, while the white sedan on the left side is gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, following the truck ahead closely. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the truck, approximately 5 meters. The driver is cautious due to the busy road conditions and the presence of multiple vehicles around.
key_objects: 1) Front: A truck, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed. 2) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 3 meters away, gradually overtaking the self-driving vehicle. 3) Right side: A black car, stationary, approximately 2 meters away.
